Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.4 Sappaṭighaduka » 2.4.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.4.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Cūḷantaraduka
Sappaṭighaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
64.
685Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava…pe…  magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.
686Paccanīyānulomaṃ.
